body.value: What follows is a map showing the city of . Temperature data is overlaid on the map: bluer means colder; redder means hotter. HOLC boundaries are also drawn onto the map. Red polygons are neighborhoods that were rated “D”.
Below is a density plot of temperature values shown in the map above based on neighborhood HOLC grade for both 2000 and 2020.

After running a Tukey’s Honestly Significant Differences Test at a 95% confidence interval, we can observe in both years which HOLC grades’ neighborhoods were significantly cooler or hotter than neighborhoods in other grades.
